publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1168 Mr Lloyd Quinan: MMR Vaccine and Autism—That the Parliament notes the new evidence from Professor Vijendra Singh of Utah State University linking the combined measles, mumps and rubella (MMR) vaccine with the increase in cases of Autistic Spectrum Disorder, and in the light of this evidence, calls for a moratorium on the use of the MMR combined vaccine and the provision of sufficient supplies of the single vaccinations to meet requirements.
S1M-1168 MMR Vaccine and Autism (lodged on 11 September 2000) Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Bruce Crawford*, Shona Robison*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Tricia Marwick*
S1M-1168 MMR Vaccine and Autism (lodged on 11 September 2000) Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Dr Winnie Ewing*, Christine Grahame*
S1M-1168 MMR Vaccine and Autism (lodged on 11 September 2000) Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Elaine Smith*

S1M-1168 Mr Lloyd Quinan: MMR Vaccine and Autism-That the Parliament notes the new evidence from Professor Vijendra Singh of Utah State University linking the combined measles, mumps and rubella (MMR) vaccine with the increase in cases of Autistic Spectrum Disorder, and in the light of this evidence, calls for a moratorium on the use of the MMR combined vaccine and the provision of sufficient supplies of the single vaccinations to meet requirements. Supported by: Mrs Margaret Ewing, Bruce Crawford, Shona Robison, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Adam Ingram, Tricia Marwick, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Dr Winnie Ewing, Christine Grahame, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Elaine Smith
S1M-1168 MMR Vaccine and Autism (lodged on 11 September 2000) Andrew Wilson*, Ms Sandra White*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-1168 MMR Vaccine and Autism (lodged on 11 September 2000) Robin Harper*
S1M-1168 MMR Vaccine and Autism (lodged on 11 September 2000) Irene McGugan*

S1M-1168 Mr Lloyd Quinan: MMR Vaccine and Autism—That the Parliament notes the new evidence from Professor Vijendra Singh of Utah State University linking the combined measles, mumps and rubella (MMR) vaccine with the increase in cases of Autistic Spectrum Disorder, and in the light of this evidence, calls for a moratorium on the use of the MMR combined vaccine and the provision of sufficient supplies of the single vaccinations to meet requirements. Supported by: Mrs Margaret Ewing, Bruce Crawford, Shona Robison, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Adam Ingram, Tricia Marwick, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Dr Winnie Ewing, Christine Grahame, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Elaine Smith, Andrew Wilson, Ms Sandra White, Tommy Sheridan, Robin Harper, Irene McGugan
S1M-1168 MMR Vaccine and Autism (lodged on 11 September 2000) Alex Neil*

S1M-1168 Mr Lloyd Quinan: MMR Vaccine and Autism—That the Parliament notes the new evidence from Professor Vijendra Singh of Utah State University linking the combined measles, mumps and rubella (MMR) vaccine with the increase in cases of Autistic Spectrum Disorder, and in the light of this evidence, calls for a moratorium on the use of the MMR combined vaccine and the provision of sufficient supplies of the single vaccinations to meet requirements. Supported by: Mrs Margaret Ewing, Bruce Crawford, Shona Robison, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Adam Ingram, Tricia Marwick, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Dr Winnie Ewing, Christine Grahame, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Elaine Smith, Andrew Wilson, Ms Sandra White, Tommy Sheridan, Robin Harper, Irene McGugan, Alex Neil

S1M-1168 Mr Lloyd Quinan: MMR Vaccine and Autism—That the Parliament notes the new evidence from Professor Vijendra Singh of Utah State University linking the combined measles, mumps and rubella (MMR) vaccine with the increase in cases of Autistic Spectrum Disorder, and in the light of this evidence, calls for a moratorium on the use of the MMR combined vaccine and the provision of sufficient supplies of the single vaccinations to meet requirements. Supported by: Mrs Margaret Ewing, Bruce Crawford, Shona Robison, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Adam Ingram, Tricia Marwick, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Dr Winnie Ewing, Christine Grahame, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Elaine Smith, Andrew Wilson, Ms Sandra White, Tommy Sheridan, Robin Harper, Irene McGugan, Alex Neil, Fiona McLeod*

S1M-1168 Mr Lloyd Quinan: MMR Vaccine and Autism—That the Parliament notes the new evidence from Professor Vijendra Singh of Utah State University linking the combined measles, mumps and rubella (MMR) vaccine with the increase in cases of Autistic Spectrum Disorder, and in the light of this evidence, calls for a moratorium on the use of the MMR combined vaccine and the provision of sufficient supplies of the single vaccinations to meet requirements.
